title: Riot Mystery Gift
body: I got a mystery gift from Riot today and got really excited. However, after I clicked on "awesome" nothing happened. Can someone tell me how I can see what my mystery gift was? I also checked all the champions I had and skins. But, I didn't see any new skins. Why is this?

replies.body: Yes, that was it. Thank you!

It was likely the Worlds Pick'em Poro icon that was being sent out in a wave today.

Let me know if that was it!
